text: Pen anɨb won ak nɨgɨnek, binɨb okok bɨnonɨm besɨg mɨdep adek sɨŋak okok besɨg yelak. Binɨb anɨb okok, God kɨlop kɨles ñɨl aglɨl agek, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop bɨlokɨpal. Pen binɨb ogɨnap, kawnan kɨlop nɨgɨnek. Kɨli tap ladek ak sek, kawnan nop tek nɨŋɨd gɨlɨlak ak sek, kɨlopmɨŋal ma agnɨŋɨd kɨdek ma gelɨgɨpal. Pen tap ladek kɨjɨkɨl ne ak, ñɨn mɨdup akaŋ nebeŋ alaŋ kɨli ak ma dɨlak. Binɨb anɨb okok, Jisas nop gos nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨl, God takaw nop dɨl agñɨl gelak kuŋam tɨkɨlak. Kɨli tepayaŋ koŋɨm mɨdɨl, Klays ayɨp wog gɨlɨg, binɨb okok kɨlop kod mɨdel mɨdel, sub 1,000 ak yɨnak.
